SA21n1400:2: aṅke yasya tathā devī catasro dikṣu cāparāḥ ||
SA21n1400:5: iha bhāvanādhikṛto mantrī caturdevīgīticodanāvibuddhaḥ prātarutthāya svahṛtsūryasthaṃ hukāraraśmibhirātmānaṃ viśodhya kṛtamukhaśaucādiko huṃ phaḍiti sthānātmayogarakṣāṃ kṛtvā dhyānālayaṃ praviśya huṃkāreṇa arghyaṃ parijapya sukhāsanopaviṣṭaḥ purastādantarikṣe bhagavantaṃ saparivāramālokya hṛnmantrakiraṇodbhavaiḥ pañcopahārameghaiḥ sampūjya pāpadeśanākamiti kuryāt-deśayāmyahamātmanaḥ pāpam,
SA21n1400:10: aho batāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimadhigaccheyaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya yāvadeteṣām atyantaniṣṭhe nirvāṇe niruttare ca tathāgatajñāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya |
SA21n1400:11: tadanu cittamātramevedaṃ sarvamasatyeva tena tenākāreṇa prakhyāti |
SA21n1400:12: tadyathā svapna ityadhimucya sarvākārān parityajya nirmalanabhonibhaṃ nirābhāsamanantaṃ prakāśamātraṃ paśyet,
SA21n1400:14: anantaraṃ purastādantarikṣasūrye hukāreṇa viśvavajraṃ vicintya taddīptaraśmisphuraṇairadho vajramayīṃ bhūmiṃ tiryagvajraprākāramupari vajrapañjaraṃ madhye ghoraśmaśānaṃ vibhāvya tanmadhye kūṭāgāramekapuṭaṃ sarvaratnamayaṃ paśyet-
SA21n1400:17: tanmadhye raktakamalamaṣṭadalaṃ dhyātvā tatkarṇikāyāmanādinidhanaṃ tāramuktāphalanibhaṃ jñānāmṛtabinduṃ dhyāyāt |
SA21n1400:19: madhyabinduta eva caturo bindūnaṣṭadigdaleṣu saṃsphārya bījākārapariṇatān paśyet,
SA21n1400:21: yathākramaṃ tebhyo vajramaṇipadmakarmakuleśān tatkulāni ca saṃsphārya punasteṣveva saṃhṛtya tatpariṇatāścatasro yoginīḥ paśyet |
SA21n1400:28: hale sahi viasia kamalu pabohiu vajjeṃ |
SA21n1400:32: atha gītikānubhāvena bhagavān bindurūpatāṃ hitvā bījadvayākārreṇāvirbhavati |
SA21n1400:34: tataḥ omkārād vairocanaṃ tatkulaṃ ca saṃsphārya saṃharet,
SA21n1400:36: tataḥ omkārrodbhavayā buddhaḍākinyā sahaiva bhagavān heruko hukārādutpadyate |
SA21n1400:53: tadanu bhagavataścakṣurindriye omkāraṃ raktaṃ śrotrendriye hukāraṃ nīlaṃ ghrāṇendriye cīkāraṃ pītaṃ jihvendriye āḥkāraṃ sitam uṣṇīṣasthāne rephaṃ haritaṃ manasi khakāraṃ sitaṃ cintayet |
SA21n1400:55: kavacanam-om āḥ hu iti kāyavāk cittādhiṣṭhānaṃ yathākramaṃ siraḥkaṇṭhahṛdayeṣu |
SA21n1400:56: stanāntare sūrye svadevatābījaṃ tajjñānasvabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatkiraṇaṅkuśairjñānamaṇḍalamākṛṣya hukāreṇa vighnānutsārya arghyaṃ dattvā jaḥ hu va hoḥ ityākṛṣya praveśya baddhvā vaśīkṛtya tena sahaikalolībhūtaṃ samayamaṇḍalaṃ paśyet |
SA21n1400:57: tato jñānabījaraśmicodita-tathāgatapreṣitāḥ pañcayoginya āgatya pañcajñānāmbupūrṇai ratnakalaśairbhagavanto yoginyaścābhiṣiñceyuḥ |
SA21n1400:65: tato'syāḥ śirasi hṛdi nābhau guhye ūrvośca yathākramaṃ om hu svā ā hā ityetān vibhāvya tairanyonyāvadhisphuradbhirasyāḥ śarīramabhivyāpya tayā hrīḥkarajaraktakamalayā akārajamuktākarṇikayā tadvad hukārajakuliśa omkārajamaṇiḥ prārabheta ratimanurāgaṃ yāmītyanena mantreṇa |
SA21n1400:66: tato maṇidvayaraśmicoditāstathāgatā āgatya mukhe praviśya vilīya kamaladale pateyuḥ |
SA21n1400:69: tato bhagavaccoditā buddhaḍākinyādayaḥ pañcabhagavatkāyameghasphuraṇaiḥ sattvānamarthaṃ yathākramam ādarśajñānaṃ suviśuddhadharmadhātujñānaṃ samatājñānaṃ pratyavekṣaṇājñānaṃ kṛtyanuṣṭhānajñānaṃ mahāvajradharapadaṃ cotpādya svakāyameghān mūlakāye saṃhareyuriti |
SA21n1400:73: tadā samāsataḥ samādhitrayaṃ vibhāvya nābhikamalakarṇikāyāṃ ravisomasampuṭaprānteṣu niḥsandhi dhyātvā tanmadhye sarṣapasūkṣmasitasvacchajñānaṃ bindurūpaṃ mahāsukhamayaṃ vīraṃ vicintya tadraśmirekhāṃ mṛṇālatantunibhāṃ candramadhyena nirgatya sampuṭaṃ tiryyak tribhirveṣṭaiḥ saṃyamya sthitāṃ dṛṣṭvā candopari sthiteṣu triṣu veṣṭārdheṣu grathitān pratyekaṃ ṣoḍaśa varṇān paśyet |
SA21n1400:79: evaṃ nābhimadhye kamalakarṇikāravisomasaṃpuṭagarbhe vīraṃ bhāvayan bhāvanāparipākamadhimucya tasmādeva dvitīyasūkṣmarekhājvalitaikajvālāvadavasthitāṃ paśyet |
SA21n1400:80: tasyāḥ prabhāveṇa sravadamṛotapūraplāvito vīraḥ sā ca raśmirekhā sitībhavet |
SA21n1400:83: upalakṣite sthairye tasyā raśmirekhāyāḥ sphuṭamālokamanantaṃ viśvamavabhāsayantaṃ vicintya sarvaṃ karatalāmalakavat paśyet,
SA21n1400:87: tathaiva ṣaḍdevatācakraṃ yogī nābhīkamalakarṇikāvasthitaravisomasampuṭagarbhe ciraṃ vicintya tathaiva ca tadraśmirekhayā varṇāvalītrayagrathitayā veṣṭatrayasaṃyute mantraṃ japet |
SA21n1400:90: tatra bhagavato mantraḥ, om hu hu |
SA21n1400:94: om ā hu, om hā hu |
SA21n1400:96: saṃpuṭagarbhe japyaṃ bījākṣaraṃ vinyasya tacchīrṣe vīramutthāpya omkāramuccārayan vī(vi)
SA21n1400:97: rāṭraśmirekhāmucchvāsavāyunā sahotthāpya tayāvabhāsya jagad buddhamayaṃ kuryāt |
SA21n1400:99: anta[ḥ] hukāraṃ uccārayan niśvāsavāyunā samākṛṣya tadbuddhamayaṃ jagad vīre saṃharet |
SA21n1400:102: sati khede viśramya sarvamidaṃ kuśalamanuttarāyai samyaksambodhaye'bhimataphalasiddhaye ca pariṇamayya pūrvavat pūjāṃ kṛtvā svahṛdbījākṣare maṇḍalamantarbhāvya,
SA21n1400:104: sarvaṃ ca bhojyaṃ pañcabhirbījaiḥ pañcajñānāmṛtamayaṃ kṛtvā svahṛdaye ca devatācakramadhimucya vicintya ca tajjihvāsu tadamṛtaṃ juhuyāt |
SA21n1400:106: madhyānhasāyāhnasamdhyayostu maṇḍalagṛhaṃ praviśya svahṛdbījaraśmibhirādhāramaṇḍalaṃ nirmāya [tasmā]deva bījāccatasro yoginīḥ krameṇa saṃsphārya yathāsthānaṃ niveśya pūrvavadabhiṣekādikaṃ sarvavidhimanuṣṭhāya maṇḍalamantarbhāvya tata utthāya pūrvavat samāhitayogaṃ kuryāt |
SA21n1400:107: ardharātrasandhyāyāṃ tvayaṃ viśeṣaḥ- saṃpūjyārghyaṃ dattvā om vajra muriti jñānamaṇḍalamutsṛjya svajñānabīje samayamaṇḍalamantarbhāvya,
SA21n1400:109: evaṃ dināntareṣvapi devīsaṅgīticodanotthāpitaḥ sarvaṃ pūrvavat kuryāt |
SA21n1400:114: tān svahṛtsūrye hṛccandre vā yathāyogaṃ maṇḍalīkṛtya pradīpamālāvajjvalataścetasā'bhilikhya manasā vācayanniva japediti |
SA21n1400:116: kuśalaṃ tena buddhaḥ syāṃ vaśī viśvārthasādhane ||
